page.title: 08ST.MARY' POTTERY
page.content: {ART AND CRAFT {Pottery} We have two{potters}on the island one of them is John Bourdeaux he lives in Old Town.He specialises in making mugs,pots and animals especially birds,he gets his{clay}from Cornwall, Devon,Stoke on Trent and a small amount from America.Some of his birds are made by other people else where, others are unique.He makes his birds by using hand made{sculptures}and by templates.His kiln is heated by gas and electric and the temperature gets up to 1300 centigrade.Mr Bourdeaux has been doing pottery for 8 years and he doesn't make any others items.His pots are made from clay that put on the wheel and then put in the kiln,he also makes them in moulds and he paints them by hand.He sells his pottery abroad,as far away as New Zealand.
